message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair and reasonable start!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve more for taking on more risk.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not getting taken advantage of. Meet me in the middle!
I'm starting to think you're not serious about meeting in the middle. I'll try to get a better deal this time.
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting the better end of this deal!
I'm not going to let you get the better deal. I think we're close enough, let's call it a draw.
